]]>content_block_programmaticeric.szonyi_SHARE2014-05-20 20:27:21false673c5cb14dfc6dc0bc95842eaf53546043Sport Dynamic Todosglobalfalseglobalcontent_block_programmatic_673c5cb14dfc6dc0bc95842eaf535460admin_SHARE2015-05-27 12:58:47false

sys_update_xml.name: content_block_static_cf304a57eb2121006395c63ca206fe19
sys_update_xml.payload:
truegeneralfalsefalseSport Release NotesVersion 3.16

 Fixes

  • General fixes for Fuji
  • Resolved package call issues in UI macros
  • Changed tasks to Approvals for Todos for performance issues
  • Fixed missing DataTables sort icons

Version 3.15

 Fixes

  • Fixed issue where Add Items anchors and buttons in the Cart redirect to the Frameset UI

Version 3.14

 Fixes

  • Fixed script errors in sport_cms_header_login UI macro related to sysparm_login_failed
  • Fixed access issue where ESS user could not display icons
  • Removed header menu and feedback control for users not logged in

 

Version 3.13

 Fixes

  • Fixed script errors in sport_cms_header_login UI macro related to sysparm_document_key
  • Fixed script errors in Sport Dynamic Header related to sysparm_is_login
  • Fixed Font Awesome style sheet for IE fix
  • Fixed broken Continue Shopping button on cart to redirect to main catalog browse page
  • Fixed Back to Catalog button on checkout screen to redirect to main catalog browse page
  • Fixed IFrame resize issue in IE10

Version 3.12

Fixes

  • De-activated default catalog item icon to prevent override of OOB or customer default
  • Fixed CSS that was causing IFrame height issues and cutting off buttons

Version 3.10

Fixes

  • Fixed issue in IE9 where pages with gsft_main IFrames would wildly resize during mouseover
  • Fixed issue with dynamic CSS failing when user is not authenticated. Processor added to public pages
  • Converted FontAwesome font files to attachments from Customer Uploads to address issues with IE8 src in CSS
  • Fixed issue with dynamic CSS inserting itself into the navigation stack

Version 3.9

Enhancements

  • Added jQuery news scroller functionality
  • Added new dynamic block for homepage ilnk blocks and news
  • Enhanced cms_menu macro to allow custom blocks for Navigation Menus
  • Added second Home page to provide alternate landing page format
  • Added new property to display a language picker in the header

Fixes

  • Fixed issue where social icons would not display in the header
  • Fixed menu block macros to check FontAwesome tags instead of image values
  • Fixed task content type so it can display a record from any extended table

Version 3.8

Fixes

  • Created UI page to address stack issue with blank page on delete from cart
  • Converted cart updating functionality to AJAX calls to fix both add and delete issues

Version 3.6

Enhancements

  • Converted Feedback Me plugin to pure CSS3 Feedback control
  • Applied Bootstrap table style to lists in IFrames
  • Applied Bootstrap styles to info and error messages in gsft_main IFrames

Fixes

Version 3.5

Enhancements

  • Added release notes page
  • Added Todos links to dynamic style sheet
  • Applied Bootstrap styles to all select dropdown elements
  • Renamed properties to include type to facilitate custom properties page

Fixes

  • Re-located inaccessible Add Content link when editing page
  • Themed main page and IFrame submit buttons properly

Version 3.4

Enhancements

  • Added Font Awesome capabilities
  • Converted ALL site icons to font awesome icons
  • Added Font Awesome tag field to Navigation menus
]]>content_block_staticadmin_SHARE2014-07-02 02:23:26falsecf304a57eb2121006395c63ca206fe1934Sport Release Notesglobalfalseglobalcontent_block_static_cf304a57eb2121006395c63ca206fe19admin_SHARE2015-05-27 13:07:43

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_macro_23eaa220eb10210093d6c63ca206fe13
sys_update_xml.payload:
truecmsDislplays the login or logout portion of the CMS header. sport_cms_header_loginsys_ui_macroadmin_SHARE2014-04-22 13:06:24false23eaa220eb10210093d6c63ca206fe1342sport_cms_header_loginglobalfalseglobalsys_ui_macro_23eaa220eb10210093d6c63ca206fe13admin_SHARE2015-05-27 12:45:32
var logoutAction = "logout.do"; var backtrack_path = ""; var tran = GlideTransaction.get(); if (tran.isVirtual()) { backtrack_path = "../"; logoutAction = backtrack_path + logoutAction; } var pageLink = new GlideCMSPageLink().getPageLink(current_page.getID()).substring(3); try { var documentKey = RP.getParameterValue('sysparm_document_key'); if (documentKey) pageLink += '?sysparm_document_key=' + documentKey; } catch(err) { } var pageLinkNotEncoded = pageLink; pageLink = GlideStringUtil.urlEncode(pageLink); var defaultPageLink = ""; var siteGR = new GlideRecord("content_site"); if (siteGR.get(current_page.getSiteID())) { var defaultPageId = siteGR.getValue("default_page"); if (defaultPageId) defaultPageLink = new GlideCMSPageLink().getPageLink(defaultPageId).substring(3); } defaultPageLink; var u = gs.getUser(); var f = user.getFirstName(); f;
  • ${gs.getMessage('Hi')}$[SP]${jvar_first_name} $[SP]$[SP]$[SP]
    • $[SP]My Profile
    • $[SP]${gs.getMessage('Logout')}
    • $[SP]Documentation
    • $[SP]Edit This Page
    • $[SP]Settings
    • $[SP]Release Notes
      •
  • ${gs.getMessage('Hi')}$[SP]${jvar_first_name}$[SP]$[SP]$[SP]
  • ${gs.getMessage('Hi')}$[SP]${jvar_first_name} $[SP]$[SP]$[SP]
    • $[SP]My Profile
    • $[SP]Documentation
    • $[SP]Edit This Page
    • $[SP]Settings
    • $[SP]Release Notes
      •
    • ]]>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_macro_a5557f2c4dd4a580bc95842eaf535463
sys_update_xml.payload:
truegeneralsport_task_indicatorsys_ui_macroaoconnor_SHARE2014-04-22 18:31:53falsea5557f2c4dd4a580bc95842eaf53546348sport_task_indicatorglobalfalseglobalsys_ui_macro_a5557f2c4dd4a580bc95842eaf535463admin_SHARE2015-05-27 12:57:35 var count = new GlideAggregate('sysapproval_approver'); count.addEncodedQuery('approver=javascript:gs.getUserID()^stateNOT INapproved,rejected,cancelled,not_required'); count.addAggregate('COUNT'); count.query(); var approvals = 0; if (count.next()) approvals = count.getAggregate('COUNT'); count = new GlideAggregate('incident'); count.addQuery('caller_id', gs.getUserID()); count.addQuery('active','true'); count.addAggregate('COUNT'); count.query(); var incidents = 0; if (count.next()) incidents = count.getAggregate('COUNT'); count = new GlideAggregate('sc_req_item'); count.addQuery('opened_by', gs.getUserID()); count.addQuery('active','true'); count.addAggregate('COUNT'); count.query(); var items = 0; if (count.next()) items = count.getAggregate('COUNT'); count = new GlideAggregate('change_request'); count.addEncodedQuery('u_business_owner=javascript:gs.getUserID()^ORrequested_by=javascript:gs.getUserID()^active=true^stateNOT IN3,4,17'); count.addAggregate('COUNT'); count.query(); var changes = 0; if (count.next()) changes = count.getAggregate('COUNT'); /* count = new GlideAggregate('task'); count.addEncodedQuery('u_caller=javascript:gs.getUserID()^ORassigned_to=javascript:gs.getUserID()^active=true^sys_class_name!=change_task^ORsys_class_name!=incident^ORsys_class_name!=sc_request^ORsys_class_name!=sc_req_item'); count.addAggregate('COUNT'); count.query(); var tasks = 0; if (count.next()) tasks = count.getAggregate('COUNT'); */ var total = +approvals + +incidents + +items + +changes; //+ +tasks; var arr = total.toString().split('.'); total = arr[0]; total;
${jvar_count}
 ]]>

var query_string = 'installed_by=' + gs.getUserName() + '&instance_name=' + gs.getProperty('instance_name') + '&artifact=abab40a52b9c8600bddaff70f8da15ac&content=b30fec4c2b5ef9004a1e976be8da151a';
gs.log('posting to: ' + query_string);
logClient.get(query_string);</script><state>0</state><sys_created_by/><sys_created_on/><sys_id>1cd433f16f85210015244035eb3ee411</sys_id><sys_mod_count/><sys_updated_by/><sys_updated_on/><system_id/><trigger_class>DEFAULT</trigger_class><trigger_type>0</trigger_type></sys_trigger></record_update>
